li.p: Install and run WinAppDriver on the test machine.

conbody.p: There are two ways to install WinAppDriver on a Windows 10 machine:

li.p: From the Katalon Studio toolbar, select Tools > Windows > Install WinAppDrivers. The Windows Application Driver Setup window opens. Follow the instructions to install the Windows Application Driver.
You can also refer to the WinAppDriver Github project document here: Installing and Running Windows Application Driver for the installation.
